Why I'm starting this blog

Welcome!

Hi! Welcome to my blog!

Glad to see you here. Now, you've come here to read about why I'm starting this blog. There are many, many reasons why I'm doing this. Some, I will describe to you now

Reason number 1: Because I want to show off my skills

I've sunk many hours into the OSINT challenges. They are a lot of fun, and I learn a lot from it. It's a waste to keep this all to myself, so next time that I complete a challenge, I can share how I did it right here, for the whole world to see!

Reason number 2: I have to have my own domain

My own name, as a domain. What a luxury! It's not terribly expensive, looks funny and hey, it could be useful too!

Reason number 3: Programming a website is fun

Well, I'm excaturating a little bit here, but it is good to remember how to build a website. It's not the best website out there, as you might tell from looking at the source code. But it's good enough for me, and I have all the files right here on my computers. No stupid private company that can take this away from me!

Many many more reasons

Perhaps I can find a new job using this website, and use it as my portfolio. Or, perhaps when I become very famous I can use this website to sell my autobiography, as every famous person needs to have one these days (or so it seems to me). Perhaps this is a good place to backup some information that I do not want to forget. Who cares, I'm an adult now, I can do whatever I want!
